content: worked bottom up and in the round in sizes newborn to adult l using simple stitches in different ways to give lots of cozy texture a one skein one hour beanie pattern you ll need <160 yards or 100g of chunky weight yarn 1 skein 8mm hook scissors and needle for finishing concentration level 1/3 simple stitches centered on single and double_crochet quick to work with decrease stitches throughout
